abstract: Apple thinks that many parts manufacturers are selling at cost, so the recession bonus that boost profit margins at Apple won’t last.
snippet: Apple thinks that many parts manufacturers are selling at cost, so the recession bonus that boost profit margins at Apple won’t last.
lead_paragraph: One lingering image from the Great Depression is that of people selling apples on the street. This recession may be remembered for a certain chain of stores selling a very different kind of Apple.
